name: EjectionFraction
title: Ejection Fraction
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent ejection fraction.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnostic Study.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with studies specific to obtaining left ventricular ejection fraction.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
